title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-6.9 - Requirements for boiler room exits-boilers installed before march 31, 1965
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-6.9 - Requirements for boiler room exits-boilers installed before march 31, 1965

State Regulations
A boiler room housing a boiler installed before March 31, 1965 shall be provided with at least one exit not less than 30 inches wide. If
a door is provided, it shall open in the direction of egress. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-6.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
